function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Improper PPE removal leading to recontamination of clothes and hands","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases to the wearer and others","Mitigation":"Proper training on PPE removal procedures and strict adherence to guidelines","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Wearers of PPE, healthcare personnel, potentially infected individuals","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, training organizations"},{"Description":"Close contact with potentially infected person","Impact":"Higher risk of contracting contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Maintain distance, provide protective gear, and follow hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Protective gear such as facemasks and gloves","People":"Individuals in close proximity to potentially infected persons","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, individuals"}]}
